item.title: The Transition Redshift
item.description: I’m working on a short reionization project where we want to figure out where a function crosses zero. I’ll spare the details of what this function (P21,g) is for the bottom of this post. But suffice it to say that the redshift where it transitions from being positive to negative (the “transition redshift”) is an interesting quantity.
